cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR. 

This paper is about improving neural networks for text classification using a novel dropout method. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses the effectiveness of the method on various text classification tasks, which suggests that it could be relevant to sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the paper mentions using global information to guide the training process, which could be relevant to sub-categories such as cs.CV (Computer Vision) that deal with analyzing and processing visual information.
